about_the_game:
This DLC is for you if you find yourself craving for something more than just the main game. The Winter Tower Official Fan Pack DLC includes the following features:

  • Side stories set after the true ending
  • Full-length opening song and ending music (WAV/MP3)
  • High-quality digital artbook (PDF)
  • Voiceover bloopers (MP3)

Media File Download Path: (Steam Local Game Folder)/The Winter Tower/DLC contents/

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
